column4: anyone here have any experience with Bose USB speakers and Ubuntu? I cannot get my system to even see they are plugged into the system when they are so I cannot choose the USB audio from the sound prefs
I got the Companion 5 but searching Google is not helping me much, I found one paost but nothing that helps when ubuntu does not see the USB Audio plugged in :(
lsusb in the terminal , to see if it's listed
any ideas on my bose issue?
thanks, i tried searching and did not end up with much on my end :(
does the usb input show up in alsamixer ?
have you looked here , I haven't read the whole page there's so much info, http://alsa.opensrc.org/Alsamixer
I have not but will check it out, thanks
in the terminal run , gstreamer-properties... a dialog box will pop up , you may be able configure your usb device
you are amazing thank you that did it finally
did you see above, does not set it system wide even when I sudo'd it
well I haven't any usb audio devices so i can't replicate , I'm afraid I've run out of ideas
ok so after I sudod that command and rebooted now I have Bose USB in my sound prefs and sound works
all working perfect thanks for the assistance today
